title: Hong Kong Elections: How 'Patriots Only' Bolsters Beijing's Grip
content:
1. Hong Kong Elections: How 'Patriots Only' Bolsters Beijing's Grip  The New York Times
  2. Hong Kong votes in overhauled 'patriots'-only election  Al Jazeera English
  3. Hong Kong goes to the polls after China purge of pro-democracy voices  NBC News
  4. Hong Kong: LegCo vote after electoral overhaul sees record low turnout  BBC News
  5. Will vote usher in a new era in Hong Kong? | Inside Story  Al Jazeera English
